extendedInfo.description: â>2200,000 users use it clean cacheâFastest scan speedâOne-Click clean system cacheâHelpful item menuâSort apps by cache size or nameâReminder functionâTwo display styleEasy Cache Cleaner is a android system tool which can clean useless application cache files ,it could save your phone disk space and make your phone speed up.[What is Application Cache Files]Application Cache Files are temporary files created by applications. For example, when browser visit a web page, it will save the image files as cache files. These cache files are not useful when app ends, so you need a system tool help you clean these old cache files. Often clean cache , is a good habit, it could save your disk space and make your phone speed up.[Feature]âOne-Click clean system cacheâFastest scan speedâSort apps by cache size or nameâReminder functionâTwo display styleâHelpful item menu(Open,Manage,Playstore Page,uninstall)âMore features are coming soon[About Permissions]All permissions required by this app are used for implement app function or required by ad ,this app has a 4.6 average rating based >1500000 users and >80000 ratings ,so please don't worry about permissions ,my apps won't do anything hurt users.[Thanks]Thanks thses friends translate and test this app:Russian:Roman RublevskiyItalian:Gian Luca BignardiCzech:Kamil TollingerFrench:Gregor MeunierGerman: Dejan GojkovMexican:Rodolfo Rmz CejaKorean Friend :ë°ë¯¸ë¦¬Hungarian Friend :PogrÃ¡nyi "Poggy" ZoltÃ¡nBrazil Friend :DelphinoTested Devices:Samsung Galaxy 2Samsung Note 2HTC Desire SSamsung  Nexus SGalaxy Nexus i9250(By Dejan Gojkov,thanks)Samsung Galaxy Y (By Delphino)ZTE SkatePlease do not hesitate to give suggestion or report bug, please contact bazingatech@hotmail.comWebsite of Icon Author:http://www.photoshopedia.com/http://www.doublejdesign.co.uk/http://www.icon-king.com/Keywords:cache clean system easy data useful file hot useful free
